title: Data Sharing
info: These settings show the data you have allowed {{orgDisplayName}} to share with specific third parties. Use the `View` button to see the details of, or revoke, that consent.
infoConsent: You have not accepted any consent requests yet.
noInfo: Sorry, there is no information available
titleReceived: We have received your agreement for

revokeConsent.title: Are you sure you want to revoke this consent?
revokeConsent.desc: By revoking this consent you might lose access to some of the services provided by {{orgDisplayName}}.

emailSubscription.title: Your Email Subscriptions
emailSubscription.info: Manage the emails you receive from us.

unsubscribe.title: You are successfully unsubscribed!
unsubscribe.descriptionHeadline: From now on, you will no longer receive the following emails from us:
unsubscribe.descriptionFooter: If you want to customize your email subscriptions, <1>manage them here</1>.

personalUpdates.title: Personal Updates
personalUpdates.info: Send me reminders and updates about the courses and programs I am currently enrolled in.

updates.title: Updates
updates.info: Send me information about new content offers (like new courses or programs) that might be interesting to me.

additionalOffers.title: Additional Offers
additionalOffers.info: Keep me updated about interesting opportunities outside the learning platform.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.info: If you wish to delete permanently your account please send an email to:
deleteAccount.hint: Just a quick reminder, closing your account means all your progress and data will be permanently deleted, including certifications you've received.
